items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Messages appear in the correct chronological order across all devices
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the user
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Allow users to initiate and participate in one-to-one and group video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start a video call from a chat window
Video and audio streams have less than 300ms latency
Calls can handle at least 4 participants without quality degradation
dependencies: WebRTC or similar video streaming service
non_functional: Maintain video resolution of at least 720p under normal conditions
End-to-end encryption for video and audio streams

notes: Assumed the application will support both one-to-one and group chats, as well as group video calls. No details provided on platforms (web, mobile), so requirements are platform-agnostic.
